tests.name: Check identical
tests.run: ./vendor/bin/pest --filter 'that there is no difference between identical strands'

tests.name: Single strand
tests.run: ./vendor/bin/pest --filter 'it completes hamming distance of single nucleotide strand'

tests.name: Small strand
tests.run: ./vendor/bin/pest --filter 'it completes hamming distance of small nucleotide strand'

tests.name: Calculate longer distance
tests.run: ./vendor/bin/pest --filter 'it calculates hamming distance on a longer strand'

tests.name: Calculate large strand distance
tests.run: ./vendor/bin/pest --filter 'it calculates hamming distance on a large strand'

tests.name: Calculate very large strand distance
tests.run: ./vendor/bin/pest --filter 'it calculates hamming distance on a very large strand'
